amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to support any Know Your Farmer, Know Your Food initative of the Department of Agriculture.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to support any Know Your Farmer, Know Your Food initiative by the Department of Agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 201 (Roll no. 438).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 201 (Roll no. 438).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Foxx.
